level.heading: DENIAL OF LICENSE AND REAPPLICATION (ยง 31-1210)

level.text: 1210.1 An applicant who has been denied a license to operate under this chapteror reasons other than for failure to complete successfully an examination mayile a new application for a license after the expiration of not less than six6) months after the denial.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 41 DCR 2812, 2821 (May 20, 1994); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 12394 (August 30, 2013).
